This publication is available at https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/state-of-the-environment/the-s

urls.title: #LandUnlocked: Carbon and water
urls.description: Race to Zero champion and Environment Agency Chair Emma Howard-Boyd and NFU deputy director Stuart Roberts look forward to COP26 and what global leaders need to do, to speed real change.
